text: Okter Petrisek was a male international table tennis player from Czechoslovakia. He won a silver medal at the 1936 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's doubles, teaming with Stanislav Kolář. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Czechoslovak table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Okter Petrisek
